title: Lynda - Google Cloud Platform2015 Essential Training
description:
Lynda - Google Cloud Platform2015 Essential Training

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

4h 1m Intermediate Sep 23, 2015 | Uploaded in Oct 6, 2015 Via Webcentara

Subject: IT 
Software: Cloud 
Author: Lynn Langit 

Learn about the services available in the Google Cloud Platform. Like other cloud vendors, Google's services are grouped into the common types, such as compute, storage, database, and networking. You'll discover how to understand which of these services fits your business requirements, start an account, and use the Google Cloud Console and other tools to work with virtual machines, Docker containers, relational data stores, NoSQL data, and services unique to Google, such as BigQuery. Google Cloud expert Lynn Langit also shares practical tips for saving money on billing, planning deployments, finding tools to work with the Google cloud, and understanding how services work together in common implementation scenarios and architectural patterns.
Topics include:
	â€¢	What is Google Cloud Platform?
	â€¢	Saving time and money with cloud services
	â€¢	Understanding billing
	â€¢	Enabling services and APIs
	â€¢	Planning deployments
	â€¢	Using compute services
	â€¢	Storing data with Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL, BigQuery, and more
	â€¢	Using networking, monitoring, and prediction services
	â€¢	Finding tools to work with the Google cloud
	â€¢	Implementing Google cloud solutions
